title: Please help me identify this font (Real Madrid new kit's font)
content:
It probably custom but can anyone help me finding out some good alternatives.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [RealMadrid0890Kit.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080920113646/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled-1_33.jpg) | 20.11 KB |

 [‹ Font ID – Contemporary sans with sloped A and W?!!](http://web.archive.org/web/20080920113646/http:/typophile.com/node/45773 "Go to previous forum topic") [can't figure out this font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080920113646/http:/typophile.com/node/45810 "Go to next forum topic")
author: slump

comments.content:
It may not be identical, but Identikal’s [Reaction](http://web.archive.org/web/20080920113646/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/t26/reaction/) seems pretty close. (I resisted more playing with identical/Identikal, for which you should be grateful.)

- Mike Yanega
